# TimeCode

**Enumeration Case**

A format for a stream of time stamps.

## Declaration

```swift
TimeCode
```

## Discussion

This format describes a stream of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/iokit/ioaudiotimestamp] valuess, using the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/iokit/ioaudiotimestamp] flags.

## Non-Sample Formats

- **MIDIStream**: A format for a stream of MIDI packet lists.
- **ParameterValueStream**: A format for a side-chain of 32-bit floating-point data.
